tool_description: The API retrieves information about Earth's most interesting mountains, likely providing details such as names, heights, locations, geological features, death zones and climbers.
name: Mountain API
title: Mountain API

api_list.name: Get a Mountain by Name
api_list.description: Retrieve a specific mountain. Search for the mountain by specifying its name as a path parameter.

api_list.name: Get ALL Mountains
api_list.description: Get all of the mountains present in the database
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mountain-api1.p.rapidapi.com/api/mountains/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mountain-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Mountain by ID
api_list.description: Retrieve a mountain from the database using the ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mountain-api1.p.rapidapi.com/api/mountains/65ee88571538ae73b345b5ee"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mountain-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mountain-api1.p.rapidapi.com/api/mountains/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mountain-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
